member.name: T:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.StyleCop.FailBuildOnSuppressMessage
member.summary: Wraps the StyleCopConsole class to provide a mechanism for scanning files for StyleCop compliance.

example.code: <Sequence DisplayName="TFSBuildExtensions StyleCop Sequence" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="818,146"> <Sequence.Variables> <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:Int32" Name="StyleCopViolationCount" /> </Sequence.Variables> <tac1:StyleCop AdditionalAddInPaths="{x:Null}" CacheResults="{x:Null}" FailBuildOnError="{x:Null}" MaximumViolationCount="{x:Null}" Succeeded="{x:Null}" TreatViolationsErrorsAsWarnings="{x:Null}" TreatWarningsAsErrors="{x:Null}" ForceFullAnalysis="True" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="200,22" LogExceptionStack="True" LogFile="[SourcesDirectory + "\StyleCopLog.txt"]" SettingsFile="[SourcesDirectory + "\Settings.StyleCop"]" ShowOutput="True" SourceFiles="[New String() {SourcesDirectory}]" ViolationCount="[StyleCopViolationCount]" XmlOutputFile="[SourcesDirectory + "\StyleCopviolations.xml"]" /> </Sequence>

member.name: F:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.StyleCop.FailBuildOnSuppressMessage.exitCode
member.summary: The status of the analysis

member.name: F:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.StyleCop.FailBuildOnSuppressMessage.violations
member.summary: The files that vioaltions encountered

member.name: M:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.StyleCop.FailBuildOnSuppressMessage.InternalExecute
member.summary: Executes the logic for this workflow activity

member.name: P:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.StyleCop.FailBuildOnSuppressMessage.SourceFiles
member.summary: Sets the source files path or list of specific files

member.name: P:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.StyleCop.FailBuildOnSuppressMessage.ViolationCount
member.summary: Gets the number of violations found.

member.name: P:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.StyleCop.FailBuildOnSuppressMessage.ShowOutput
member.summary: Sets a value indicating whether to show names of files scanned to the build log

member.name: P:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.StyleCop.FailBuildOnSuppressMessage.Succeeded
member.summary: Gets whether the scan succeeded.

member.name: T:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.CodeQuality.StyleCop
member.summary: Wraps the StyleCopConsole class to provide a mechanism for scanning files for StyleCop compliance.

example.code: <Sequence DisplayName="TFSBuildExtensions StyleCop Sequence" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="818,146"> <Sequence.Variables> <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:Int32" Name="StyleCopViolationCount" /> </Sequence.Variables> <tac1:StyleCop AdditionalAddInPaths="{x:Null}" CacheResults="{x:Null}" FailBuildOnError="{x:Null}" MaximumViolationCount="{x:Null}" Succeeded="{x:Null}" TreatViolationsErrorsAsWarnings="{x:Null}" TreatWarningsAsErrors="{x:Null}" ForceFullAnalysis="True" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="200,22" LogExceptionStack="True" LogFile="[SourcesDirectory + "\StyleCopLog.txt"]" SettingsFile="[SourcesDirectory + "\Settings.StyleCop"]" ShowOutput="True" SourceFiles="[New String() {SourcesDirectory}]" ViolationCount="[StyleCopViolationCount]" XmlOutputFile="[SourcesDirectory + "\StyleCopviolations.xml"]" /> </Sequence>

member.name: F:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.CodeQuality.StyleCop.DefaultViolationLimit
member.summary: The default maximum number of violations that can be discovered

member.name: F:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.CodeQuality.StyleCop.exitCode
member.summary: The status of the analysis

member.name: F:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.CodeQuality.StyleCop.violations
member.summary: The files that vioaltions encountered

member.name: F:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.CodeQuality.StyleCop.violationLimit
member.summary: The maximum violation count

member.name: M:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.CodeQuality.StyleCop.InternalExecute
member.summary: Executes the logic for this workflow activity

member.name: P:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.CodeQuality.StyleCop.BuildAssociatedChangesets
member.summary: Sets the associated changesets for the build.

member.name: P:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.CodeQuality.StyleCop.Workspace
member.summary: Team Foundation Workspace of your build workflow.

member.name: P:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.CodeQuality.StyleCop.MaximumViolationCount
member.summary: Sets the maximum violation count before scanning is halted.

member.name: P:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.CodeQuality.StyleCop.ViolationCount
member.summary: Gets the number of violations found.

member.name: P:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.CodeQuality.StyleCop.ShowOutput
member.summary: Sets a value indicating whether to show names of files scanned to the build log

member.name: P:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.CodeQuality.StyleCop.Succeeded
member.summary: Gets whether the scan succeeded.

member.name: P:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.CodeQuality.StyleCop.FullStyleCopCompliance
member.summary: Fails build on Error.

member.name: P:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.CodeQuality.StyleCop.CacheResults
member.summary: Sets a value indicating whether StyleCop should write cache files to disk after performing an analysis. Default is false.

member.name: P:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.CodeQuality.StyleCop.ForceFullAnalysis
member.summary: Sets a value indicating whether StyleCop should ignore cached results and perform a clean analysis.

member.name: P:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.CodeQuality.StyleCop.XmlOutputFile
member.summary: Sets the name for the XML log file produced by the StyleCop runner

member.name: P:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.CodeQuality.StyleCop.LogFile
member.summary: Sets the text log file that list the violation

member.name: P:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.CodeQuality.StyleCop.SourceFiles
member.summary: Sets the source files path or list of specific files

member.name: P:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.CodeQuality.StyleCop.SettingsFile
member.summary: Sets the path to the settings file that defines the rules

member.name: P:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.CodeQuality.StyleCop.AdditionalAddInPaths
member.summary: Set the location of any custom addins

member.name: P:TfsBuildExtensions.Activities.CodeQuality.StyleCop.TreatViolationsErrorsAsWarnings
member.summary: Set to true to treat all stylecop violations as warnings
